results.description: Police Scotland investigates fan misbehaviour, including spitting at a match official, at Saturday's Scottish Championship game between Queen of the South and Ayr United.
results.title: Police Scotland investigates Ayr United fans after spitting at match official

results.description: Queen of the South pick up their first Championship win in four games by beating Ayr at Palmerston Park.
results.shortTitle: Queens beat Ayr to end losing run
results.title: Queen of the South 3-1 Ayr United

thumbnail.altText: Gary Oliver (right) celebrates with Stephen Dobbie against Dumbarton

results.description: Dunfermline Athletic ease past Queen of the South to record back-to-back Scottish Championship wins for the first time this season.
results.shortTitle: Dunfermline beat Queen's for back-to-back wins
results.title: Dunfermline Athletic 2-0 Queen of the South: hosts earn back-to-back wins for first tie this term

results.description: Inverness CT keep pace with title rivals Dundee United and Ayr United with a hard-fought victory over Queen of the South in Dumfries.
results.shortTitle: Inverness CT keep pace with win at Queens
results.title: Queen of South 0-2 Inverness CT: Doran & Todorov earn win

results.description: Alloa battle back from two goals down to claim a draw at home to Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Alloa battle back from two goals down
results.title: Alloa Athletic 2-2 Queen of the South: Hosts battle back from two goals down

results.description: Dundee United stay top of the Scottish Championship despite a humiliating 4-0 defeat by Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Dobbie nets twice as QoS beat leaders
results.title: Queen of South 4-0 Dundee Utd: Stephen Dobbie nets twice to beat leaders

results.description: Darren Brownlie's first goal in 18 months brought Queen of the South a valuable Scottish Championship win at Partick Thistle.
results.shortTitle: Queens inflict defeat on McCall's home bow
results.title: Partick Thistle 0-1 Queen of the South: Brownlie the hero for Queens

results.description: Stephen Dobbie scored 43 goals for Queen of the South last season yet this time around he has failed to score in their first five Scottish Championship games.
results.shortTitle: 'I'm not worried by lack of goals' - Dobbie
results.title: 'I'm not worried by lack of goals' - Stephen Dobbie

thumbnail.altText: 'I'm not worried by lack of goals'

results.description: Live coverage followed by match report of Friday's Scottish Championship game between Queen of the South and Dundee.
results.shortTitle: Dundee held at Queen of the South
results.title: Queen of the South 1-1 Dundee: Jordan McGhee rescues point for visitors

results.description: Inverness Caledonian Thistle remain just two points off the Scottish Championship summit following victory over Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Welsh & Walsh score as Inverness win
results.title: Inverness CT 2-0 Queen of the South: Welsh & Walsh score in win

results.description: A Scottish football club has been plagued with issues - but what are the options to address it?
results.title: How do you solve a problem like the seagulls?

results.description: A first-half Faissal El Bakhtaoui goal earns Queen of the South their first Scottish Championship win of the season to beat Morton.
results.shortTitle: Queens grab first win of the campaign
results.title: Queen of the South 1-0 Greenock Morton

results.description: All the arrivals and departures during summer 2019 in the Scottish Championship.
results.shortTitle: Scottish Championship summer ins and outs
results.title: Scottish Championship ins and outs - Summer 2019

results.description: Dundee join city rivals Dundee United in being knocked out of the Challenge Cup third round after a 2-1 home defeat by League Two side Elgin City.
results.shortTitle: Both Dundee clubs out of Challenge Cup
results.title: Scottish Challenge Cup: Dundee lose to Elgin, Dundee United defeated on penalties by Arbroath

thumbnail.altText: Elgin's Shane Sutherland celebrates against Dundee

results.description: Alan Trouten scores the only goal at Palmerston as Alloa move from bottom spot to seventh place in the Championship.
results.shortTitle: Trouten goal for Alloa sinks Queens
results.title: Queen of the South 0-1 Alloa Athletic: Alan Trouten goal lifts Wasps off the bottom

thumbnail.altText: Alan Trouten was on target for Alloa

results.description: A spectacular first half-volley by Steven Kelly earns Ayr United maximum points against Queen of the South.
results.shortTitle: Kelly strike gives Ayr win over Queens
results.title: Ayr United 1-0 Queen of the South: Stunning strike from Steven Kelly

thumbnail.altText: Steven Kelly scored a stunning goal for Ayr United

results.description: Queen of the South says the appeal "made a difference" to problems with scavenging birds.
results.shortTitle: Fans thanked for heeding seagull feeding warning
results.title: Queen of the South fans thanked for not feeding seagulls

results.description: Queen of the South striker Gary Oliver strikes in the second half to deny Dunfermline Athletic a first win of the Scottish Championship season.
results.shortTitle: Oliver earns Queens point against Pars
results.title: Queen of the South 1-1 Dunfermline Athletic: Gary Oliver earns point

results.description: Faissal El Bakhtaoui joins Queen of the South on a one-year deal and could face former club Dunfermline on Saturday.
results.title: Faissal El Bakhtaoui: Queen of the South sign striker on one-year deal

thumbnail.altText: Faissal El Bakhtaoui and Stuart Bannigan

results.description: The Scottish Championship side warns supporters they will be removed from Palmerston Park if they feed the birds.
results.shortTitle: Seagull feeders face football ground ejection
results.title: Queen of the South threaten ejection for seagull feeders
